messages.content: 9-1-1, what's your emergency?
This is an emergency. We're on a hike at Lake Malacca, and my kids are trapped in a snow cave.
Ma'am, I need you to calm down so I can help you. Where exactly are you?
Lake Malacca. We accessed it from the Jenny Creek Trailhead.
Okay. How far up from the Jenny Creek Trailhead are you?
We're at the first falls, about two miles in.
How long ago did this happen?
It just collapsed about three minutes ago.
How many kids are trapped?
My 17-year-old son and a 14-year-old neighbor boy.
And it's a big snow cave that collapsed on them?
Yes, it's a big bunch of snow.
Okay, ma'am. How far into the cave were they?
Maybe 100 feet in.
And how deep do you think the collapse is? Can you tell?
I can't tell from here.
My partner has already started help. What's your name?
Joanie Corbett. J-O-A-N-I-E C-O-R-B-E-T-T.
Is there anyone else with you that can head back down the trail to direct rescue crews?
There's a gentleman here trying to help, and my neighbor, the mother of the other boy, but she's too upset.
Can you hear them if they yell?
No, we can't hear anything. They have their cell phones, but there's no signal.
Stay as calm as you can. We need to keep them calm to conserve their air, okay?
Okay. Please hurry.
You're doing great. My partner has started help already. They will get to you as fast as they can.
Are they hiking in? They won't make it if they're hiking in.
No, listen to me. My partner started help as soon as I figured out where you were. They are coming.
I need to call my husband.
Can someone else take the phone while you call your husband?
Okay. Hi, this is Chrissy, the other mom.
Okay, Chrissy. How old is your son?
He's 14, and the other boy is 17.
Is it a snow cave or an ice cave?
It's a snow cave. It hasn't melted yet.
Okay. My partner started help as soon as we got your location. Is there a name for the waterfall?
We don't know. It's just the first falls from the Jenny Creek Trailhead.
Okay. How deep do you think the collapsed part is?
It's probably 20 by 20 yards.
How far into the cave was the collapse?
About 10 yards in.
You're doing great. We have search and rescue and the fire department on their way.
Thank you. Please hurry.
Can you confirm Joni's phone number?
Her cell number is 2006-372-3776.
Thank you, Chrissy. Please stay as calm as you can.
I will. Thank you.
